content.description: The question refers to the image shown.
content.question: Although the statues’ bodies remain attached to the rock behind them, the areas around both heads and the feet of the larger figure were freestanding (carved in the round) to provide

choices.label: sheltered places in which congregations could pray
a means for visitors to admire the skill of the carvers
places in which offerings could be left
